Sentencas: In this study, we provide the synthesis and analysis of the structure, microstructure, and spectroscopic properties of V-doped SrTiO3.
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics

Sentencas: The monophasic samples were made using the usual ceramic method, which involved calcination at temperatures of 1000 degrees C and 1300 degrees C.
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction analysis, combined with the Rietveld refinement, conclusively demonstrates that they have crystallized in a cubic structure, namely under the space group pm (3) over barm
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics

Sentencas: The inclusion of vanadium (V) at the titanium (Ti) site has been investigated by evaluating the size of the crystallite and grain.
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics

Sentencas: The investigation of dielectric and dissipation factors at different frequencies indicates the existence of interfacial and orientational polarization.
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics

Sentencas: Two distinct conduction and relaxation processes were identified within the temperature range examined based on the spectroscopic plot.
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics

Sentencas: The presence of a paramagnetic phase in the samples, caused by the presence of V and its magnetic interaction with oxygen vacancies, indicates that it can be classified as a soft magnetic material.
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics

Sentencas: The electrode's consistent dielectric constant and dissipation factor make it well-suited for use in supercapacitor dielectric capacitors.
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics

Sentencas: Additionally, its mixed-type conduction, involving both ionic and electronic conduction, makes it excellent for use as electrodematerials in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells' applications.
Titulo: Structural, microstructure, spectroscopic, and magnetic investigation of vanadium-doped SrTiO3 perovskite ceramics
